text: Tairɨn nguibar ekiamɨn gumazir mam, an ziam Huram. Gumazir kam, brasɨn bizibar ingarir fofozir gumazir ekiam. An afeziam Tairɨn gumazim, a uaghan brasɨn bizibar ingarir fofozir gumazim, ezɨ an aremegha gɨfa. Huramɨn amebam, a Naptalin anabamɨn amizir mam. Solomon Huram bagha akam amadazɨ, a iza Solomon a mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, brasɨn biziba bar dar ingari.
